comment: /**  * Rewrite the url.  *  * @param url  the absolute url (eg with scheme://host:port/path?query)  * @param relativeUrl optional relative url, if bridging endpoints, which then would be without the base path from the  *                    endpoint from the given producer.  * @param producer the producer to use the rewritten url  * @return the rewritten url, or <tt>null</tt> to use the original url  * @throws Exception is thrown if error rewriting the url  */
code: /**  * Rewrite the url.  *  * @param url  the absolute url (eg with scheme://host:port/path?query)  * @param relativeUrl optional relative url, if bridging endpoints, which then would be without the base path from the  *                    endpoint from the given producer.  * @param producer the producer to use the rewritten url  * @return the rewritten url, or <tt>null</tt> to use the original url  * @throws Exception is thrown if error rewriting the url  */ String rewrite(String url, String relativeUrl, Producer producer) throws Exception.
